message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with image captioning, which is a task related to computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed method involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques such as perplexity prediction and semantic matching, which are sub-fields of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The use of external knowledge from a pre-trained object detection model and visual matching module also involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper involves information retrieval (cs.IR) as it deals with finding the most accurate words to describe an image.
